resources.string: Time Trakr
What task are you working on?
Activities
Results
Are you sure you want to delete \'%s\' started at %s?
Delete
Cancel
Activity name should be at least %d characters long.
\'%s\' has already been started at %s.
since %s
Work logs for today
Start
Total duration: %s
What did you expect to see here? Try actually doing something first, then come back.
The rolling stone gathers no moss… nevermind, just trying to be smart right here.
The sleeping fox catches no chickens… nevermind, just trying to be smart right here.
… what? A chicken?
*Whistles that bloody song, that got stuck in your head last evening.*
This is just a fallback-message, so nevermind.
Have you checked your Twitter lately?
Ya know, i was thinking about dismissal… Did i just said that out loud?
They are watching. Or… at least i\'m watching.
You are really trying, aren\'t ya? Keep trying a lil bit more than one minute and you will inevitably see the result.
It is not a sex, you have to last longer than a minute to see results here.
Did you forget about “%s”?
I think you should work more on that “%s”.
”%s” for %s? Am i the only one embarrassed here to log this in the actual time tracking system?
Take a break, pal. “%s” won’t go anywhere. Probably.
Stand up, go outside and take a pause. “%s” is tough, but you can beat it. Just need a different angle.
You should’ve split that “%s” into sub-tasks, you dummy.
What a roller coaster you have today.
Well it’s time to go home.
It’s already 8h. Pack up - we are leaving.
Why do i always have to wait for you? It’s 8h already, let’s go!
Are you crazy or what? It has been 9h hours or something!
Alright! If you are that stupid to stay at work for a freaking 9 hours, that’s fine! Let ME go home. I’m literally dying!
It has been 9 hours! HELP! Let me go. I wan’t to sleep.
Don’t be shy, press that little green button down there.
I dare you! I double-dare you press that button down there! You think you’r tough huh? You think you have guts to press that button? Try me!
Em… Hello there? Are you lost? It’s %s. Nothing to look at here.
It’s %s. Close me RIGHT NOW!
Yeah-yeah i’m cool and stuff. Can’t get enough of me? Bae, it’s %s. I need a rest as much as you.
What? I was having a wonderful %s and then you showed up. I’m trying not to be offensive here, but can you get on with your day and leave me, please?
Do you really need to pop me out at %s?
Go to sleep, you weirdo.
